mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_info (bi_wri_seq, bi_gr_seq, bi_title, bi_pb_name,bi_explain, bi_end_page) VALUES (#{bi_wri_seq}, #{bi_gr_seq}, #{bi_title}, #{bi_pb_name},#{bi_explain}, #{bi_end_page})

INSERT INTO library_db.book_cover_info (bc_img_file, bc_bi_seq, bc_is_poster) VALUES
(#{item},#{seq},0)

INSERT INTO book_content_info (bcon_page, bcon_text, bcon_bi_seq) VALUES
(#{item.order},#{item.content},#{seq})
mapper.select: select a.*,b.wri_name ,c.gr_name,d.bc_img_file from book_info a left outer join writer_info b on a.bi_wri_seq = b.wri_seq left outer join genre_info c on a.bi_gr_seq = c.gr_seq left outer join ( select * from book_cover_info where bc_is_poster =1 )d on a.bi_seq = d.bc_bi_seq where bi_title like '%${keyword}%' order by bi_reg_dt desc limit 10 offset #{offset}
select ceil(count(*)/10) from book_info where bi_title like '%${keyword}%'

select a.ar_seq ,a.ar_title ,c.bc_img_file from admin_recommend_books a left outer join book_info b on a.ar_bi_seq = b.bi_seq left outer join ( select * from book_cover_info where bc_is_poster = 1 )c on b.bi_seq = c.bc_bi_seq group by ar_title having ar_title like '%${keyword}%' limit 10 offset #{offset}
select ceil(count(distinct(ar_title))/10) from admin_recommend_books where ar_title like '%${keyword}%'

select b.bi_seq ,b.bi_title ,c.bc_img_file ,d.wri_name from admin_recommend_books a left outer join book_info b on a.ar_bi_seq = b.bi_seq left outer join book_cover_info c on b.bi_seq = c.bc_bi_seq left outer join writer_info d on b.bi_wri_seq = d.wri_seq where ar_title = #{title}
